item.description:
Topic: Mobile development and DotNetNuke - options, tools, approaches.
Speaker: Steve Fabian

Steve Fabian has been developing software for over 25 years in dozens of programming languages. From small utility applications to large scale core enterprise applications used by hundreds of thousands of users.

Steve is a member of the DotNetNuke Core Development Team and Project Trustee, the leading Web Content Management Platform for Microsoft ASP.NET, as well as the Project Lead for the DotNetNuke Repository Module and the Module Release Tracker Process.

Steve is also a 5-time Microsoft MVP in the ASP.NET category.

This meeting is sponsored by our friends at INTERTECH. ONE WEEK OF ONLINE (OR IN PERSON) TRAINING WILL BE GIVEN AWAY AT THIS MEETING - $2,495 value!
item.name: DotNetNuke Boston User Group
